details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan try to talk about a present day episode, but end up deciding to celebrate Halloween by dipping back to 2002 to discuss a spooky interview Alex did with a guy who is very afraid of witches.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/10/31/episode-611-oct-29-2021 Episode #611: Oct 29, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex misrepresents a [https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/docs-reminder-now-nobody-is-too-young-for-a-heart-attack/articleshow/86592692.cms Times of India headline] about rates of heart attack among young people
*[https://health.clevelandclinic.org/why-are-heart-attacks-on-the-rise-in-young-people/ Cleveland Clinic article] about rising rates of youth heart attacks from 2019, prior to Covid and Covid vaccines
*Alex reports on a meme about an ad on the side of a bus
*The ad was paid for by an advocacy group called [https://www.achievingbeyondbraininjury.com/about-us Achieving Beyond Brain Injury]
*[https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4348138/ Vascular Health and Risk Management article] citing young people as representing 10-15% of stroke patients
*Alex [https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/sandalwood-star-puneeth-rajkumar-gets-his-first-dose-covid-19-vaccine-146780 makes up details] about Indian actor Puneeth Rajkumar's death to try to make it about Covid vaccines
*Rajkumar's father, another famous actor, [https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/Kannada-actor-Rajkumar-dies-of-heart-attack/articleshow/1487948.cms died of a heart attack]
*Alex [https://7news.com.au/news/wa/bizarre-claims-made-by-anti-vaxxers-at-rally-held-outside-government-house-on-wednesday-c-4347329 makes up details] about the death of Australian broadcaster Russell Woolf to try to make it about Covid vaccines

title: 611: October 29, 2021

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan actually get back to the present day to find out what Alex's take is on the Lincoln Project's recent publicity stunt, and a piece that Jim Acosta did about Tucker Carlson on CNN.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/3/episode-612-october-31-2021 Episode #612: October 31, 2021]</ref>:

*The Lincoln Project did [https://lincolnproject.us/statement-from-the-lincoln-project-5/ a dumb PR stunt] at a VA gubernatorial election press event
*The Lincoln Project's financial dynamics examined by [https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2020/05/lincoln-project-capitalizes-on-trump-rage/ Open Secrets], and later [https://www.huffpost.com/entry/lincoln-project-anti-trump-group-crisis_n_60252080c5b6b295bc04bbbf Huffington Post]
*One of the co-founders of the Lincoln Project [https://apnews.com/article/donald-trump-33a03c2280fff515a09c4d51365cb83d was accused by many of harassment]
*Christopher Rufo has a new corporate seminar to be mad about, [https://christopherrufo.com/white-people-you-are-the-problem/ this time from AT&T]
*Most of the fake outrage directed at the AT&T seminar is actually just about [https://www.chicagotribune.com/columns/dahleen-glanton/ct-racism-white-people-george-floyd-20200531-tmdbj52ownc7fegdargh75k4qq-story.html an op-ed from the Chicago Tribune], which the seminar included a link to
*Christopher Rufo [https://www.newyorker.com/news/annals-of-inquiry/how-a-conservative-activist-invented-the-conflict-over-critical-race-theory has been very clear in the past] that his pushing of fears about Critical Race Theory is a cynical attempt to rebrand racism as legitimate politics, following in the tradition of the John Birch Society and noted racist friend of Roger Stone, [https://www.thenation.com/article/archive/exclusive-lee-atwaters-infamous-1981-interview-southern-strategy/ Lee Atwater]
*Candidates endorsed by Trump actually do have [https://ballotpedia.org/Endorsements_by_Donald_Trump a pretty good record] in GOP primaries
*There was [https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/factcheck/2020/12/16/fact-check-claim-ga-vote-spike-biden-after-pipe-burst-false/3879081001/ a pipe that burst] at the State Farm Arena, but it had nothing to do with [https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/factcheck/2020/12/14/fact-check-georgia-suitcase-video-missing-context/3892640001/ the video that people like Alex pretended captured vote counters cheating]
*Bill Clinton's [https://news.gallup.com/poll/116584/presidential-approval-ratings-bill-clinton.aspx approval ratings in Gallup] do not reflect a large spike after the Oklahoma City bombing
*Alex and Tucker like to argue that January 6th was basically just tourists, but also like to forget that [https://www.npr.org/2021/09/09/1035402389/the-fbi-releases-new-video-of-the-suspect-who-planted-bombs-before-the-capitol-r the FBI has released surveillance video] of the suspect who planted bombs the night before
*The National Guard [https://www.militarytimes.com/news/your-military/2021/01/07/this-is-why-the-national-guard-didnt-respond-to-the-attack-on-the-capitol/ was not allowed to operate on federal property], which is why they were able to respond to Mayor Bowser's request and come to DC, but not to the capitol itself, without federal approval
*It doesn't seem like anyone actually shit on Nancy Pelosi's desk on January 6. [https://www.thedailybeast.com/youtuber-poops-on-nancy-pelosis-driveway-in-honor-of-president-trump-says-report Someone shit on her driveway] in September 2020, and rioters [https://www.indy100.com/news/capitol-riot-nancy-pelosi-poop-desk-b1927783 were alleged to have been shouting] for someone to shit on her desk
*Alex is mad at Jim Acosta
*Neither Jim Acosta nor CNN were responsible for the allegations that Trump removed the bust of MLK Jr. That was [https://time.com/4645541/donald-trump-white-house-oval-office/ a reporter with Time Magazine] who made that mistake

title: 612: October 31, 2021

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan hang out in the past in search of inspiration, which Dan finds when he realizes that California governor Gray Davis is about to be recalled, and Alex is about to lose his mind about Arnold Schwarzenegger.  Also, Alex tells stories of youthful fighting that seem very light on murder.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/4/episode-613-june-24-25-2003 Episode #613: June 24-25, 2003]</ref>:

*Alex believes that the fact that members of the Bush administration were on Cipro prior to the anthrax letters showing up proves that they had advance knowledge that the letters were coming, and thus a false flag is proven. This is very dumb. There is [https://my.clevelandclinic.org/health/diseases/10853-anthrax a vaccine for anthrax], and the reason that the Bush team members were on Cipro was because of [https://www.politico.eu/article/were-the-only-plane-in-the-sky-september-11-george-bush/ fears surrounding the immediate aftermath of 9/11]
*Alex has taken all of his details about the Cipro situation from unfounded allegations from [https://www.nytimes.com/2002/06/08/us/traces-of-terror-suit-seeking-anthrax-documents-is-filed.html Larry Klayman's lawsuit] alleging advance knowledge on the part of the Bush administration. It's all baseless and also not true
*The Houston police department DNA lab [https://tulsaworld.com/archive/leaky-roof-not-only-woe-in-houston-police-lab/article_8a5be91d-3afd-506f-bd2a-bf0a203bdf2c.html was a mess] in late 2002. You can find [http://www.hpdlabinvestigation.org/reports/070613report.pdf the report of the audit here]
*Alex knows literally nothing about Leo Strauss, even though he is [https://web.archive.org/web/20050206192824/http://www.atimes.com/atimes/Middle_East/EE09Ak01.html the basis of most of Alex's conspiracies] about neoconservatives being secretly liberals
*[http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/politics/1947370.stm A year old article in the BBC] has Alex afraid that the ADL is trying to outlaw the Bible

title: 613: June 24-25, 2003

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in to see if Tucker Carlson's new documentary series Patriot Purge (which Alex claims to have assisted with) is as similar to Infowars as everyone is saying. Spoiler alert: it is.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/7/episode-614-the-purge-of-gates Episode #614: The Purge Of Gates]</ref>:

*Fox Nation is the sort of streaming platform that [https://nation.foxnews.com/the-fuhrman-diaries/ employs Mark Fuhrman], who has said a bunch of [https://www.bustle.com/articles/150320-transcripts-of-the-fuhrman-tapes-excerpts-show-why-they-were-such-a-blow-to-the-states racist shit] in the past, and [https://www.tampabay.com/archive/1995/08/19/fuhrman-tells-of-torture-on-tape-transcript/ bragged about torturing people]
*Fox Nation [https://press.foxnews.com/2021/02/fox-nation-to-launch-new-exclusive-content-with-tucker-carlson announced new exclusive content] from Tucker Carlson in February, and saw a [https://variety.com/vip/whats-fueling-fox-nation-subscriber-growth-per-mobile-data-1234970267/ considerable spike] in subscriber counts
*The co-writer of this documentary's previous work includes [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm1692070/ directing multiple right-wing propaganda films]
*Center for Strategic and International Studies [https://www.csis.org/analysis/escalating-terrorism-problem-united-states analysis of domestic terrorism] events
*Darren Beattie [https://www.nydailynews.com/news/ny-pol-white-house-white-nationalist-darren-beattie-trump-20180819-story.html left the Trump administration] after it was revealed that he was associated with the [https://www.splcenter.org/hatewatch/2016/11/04/white-nationalists-gather-baltimore-ninth-annual-hl-mencken-club-conference HL Mencken Club], a supposedly intellectual [https://www.villagevoice.com/2013/07/10/is-the-h-l-mencken-club-an-extremist-hate-group-or-just-a-bunch-of-weary-old-white-guys/ group of white nationalists]
*Early inaccurate reporting about the death of Officer Sicknick was not made up out of thin air, it was based on a press release from [https://www.uscp.gov/media-center/press-releases/loss-uscp-colleague-brian-d-sicknick the Capital Police Department] and two anonymous sources within law enforcement
*[https://www.propublica.org/article/officer-brian-sicknick-capitol Sicknick's brother has confirmed] that he was pepper-sprayed multiple times on January 6 and passed out requiring CPR
*A little [https://web.archive.org/web/20160210201318/http://www.digitaljournal.com/article/330847 historical background] on Ali Alexander
*Tucker Carlson [https://www.mediamatters.org/tucker-carlson/unearthed-audio-shows-tucker-carlson-using-white-nationalist-rhetoric-and-making said all sorts of horrific shit in radio appearances] between 2006-2009
*4 people were stabbed and 33 were arrested at a [https://www.cnn.com/2020/12/12/us/stop-the-steal-protest-washington-dc-trnd/index.html Washington Stop the Steal rally]
*1 person was arrested for assault at an [https://www.idahopress.com/eyeonboise/trump-supporters-hold-stop-the-steal-rally-isp-reports-one-arrest-for-assault/article_c181258b-8682-5a27-a3f9-528030c811b0.html Idaho Stop the Steal rally]
*A man was arrested for tearing a woman's mask off at a [https://fox17.com/news/nation-world/man-arrested-video-shows-him-ripping-off-protestors-mask-florida-trump-rally Pensacola Stop the Steal rally]
*4 people were arrested at a [https://www.kptv.com/news/stop-the-steal-rally-held-in-salem/article_ced8d6ac-21fd-11eb-9b78-ef86fc22e810.html Salem Stop the Steal rally]
*Stop the Steal did not have a permit to have an event on January 6. Ali and associates had managed to get [https://s3.documentcloud.org/documents/21059849/leopold-capitol-police-protest-permits-january-6-common-law-release.pdf a permit for a stealth event called One Nation Under God], which was for a [https://www.uscp.gov/sites/uscapitolpolice.house.gov/files/wysiwyg_uploaded/U.S.%20Capitol%20Grounds%20Demonstration%20Area%20Map.pdf small area on the capital grounds], specifically for 50 attendees or less
*The Multanomah DA's office maintains a [https://www.mcda.us/index.php/protest-cases dashboard of protest related arrests]
*There are [https://www.koin.com/news/protests/portland-rioter-gets-4-years-for-arson-assault/#:~:text=PORTLAND%2C%20Ore.,riot%20of%20September%2023%2C%202020. plenty] of [https://www.justice.gov/usao-or/pr/portland-man-sentenced-federal-prison-arson-during-protest-multnomah-county-justice examples] of left-wing [https://www.oregonlive.com/crime/2021/06/portland-man-who-pleaded-guilty-to-setting-fire-near-police-precinct-gets-5-years-in-prison.html protesters] who got arrested and charged with crimes. They didn't all get away with everything, as folks in the right-wing media pretend
*[https://apnews.com/article/records-rebut-claims-jan-6-rioters-55adf4d46aff57b91af2fdd3345dace8 Analysis of the actual cases] finds that there is not a trend of left-wing protesters getting away with protest related crime
*Elijah Schaffer was inside the capitol on Jan. 6 and [https://mashable.com/article/elijah-schaffer-youtube-demonetization referred to the rioters as "revolutionaries"] that day. Much like everyone else in the right-wing media sphere, his tone has changed since then and now it was a false flag pulled off with agent provocateurs
*The Center for Security Policy is considered [https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/extremist-files/group/center-security-policy an extremist group] by the SPLC
*CSP founder Frank Gaffney Jr was a very hawkish voice regarding the Iraq war, and has [https://jewishworldreview.com/cols/gaffney121305.asp written articles] [https://centerforsecuritypolicy.org/too-little-surveillance-2/ supporting the Patriot Act] on many occasions
*The CSP is an intensely Islamophobic organization, and have promoted the idea of [https://wayback.archive-it.org/3097/20180228192240/https://www.centerforsecuritypolicy.org/civilization-jihad-reader-series/ Civilization Jihad], which argues that Muslim immigration to the US is a stealth aspect of attempting to take over the country. This is just outright bigotry
*J. Michael Waller claimed that he saw people that he felt were provocateurs on January 6, but there is no evidence to back up his impressions, and [https://thefederalist.com/2021/01/14/i-saw-provocateurs-at-the-capitol-riot-on-jan-6/ the case he makes] is not very compelling. It's entirely possible that he saw people acting like they were in the military because [https://www.npr.org/2021/01/21/958915267/nearly-one-in-five-defendants-in-capitol-riot-cases-served-in-the-military 1 out 5 people arrested on Jan. 6 had served in the military]
*J Michael Waller participated as a talking head in [https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13736456/?ref_=nm_flmg_wr_1 Lauren Southern's film Crossfire], arguing that Anifa events are orchestrated by agent provocateurs, which indicates that he had come to this conclusion prior to the events of January 6, and as such, his impartiality about his experience is an open question
*Taylor Hansen is not a journalist, he's [https://www.yahoo.com/now/anti-abortion-terrorism-fueled-maga-220042430.html an anti-abortion activist] who recorded himself burning a Black Lives Matter flag on the evening of January 5

[[File:https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/58bc3c86b8a79bbdc67b182c/1636344419035-J1HM2V8NXTSSP7V3KFGD/Hansen.JPG|thumb|none|alt=Image of Taylor used in Tucker's documentary to illustrate his assault in Utah|Image of Taylor used in Tucker's documentary to illustrate his assault in Utah]]

[[File:https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/58bc3c86b8a79bbdc67b182c/1636344441793-C7KVQNX5O520NC3GGE30/Hansen2.JPG|thumb|none|alt=Image of Taylor from a [https://www.christianpost.com/news/baby-lives-matter-activist-beaten-bloodied-by-antifa-rioters-in-portland.html Sept. 2020 article on Christian Post] about an assault that happened in Portland|Image of Taylor from a [https://www.christianpost.com/news/baby-lives-matter-activist-beaten-bloodied-by-antifa-rioters-in-portland.html Sept. 2020 article on Christian Post] about an assault that happened in Portland]]

*[https://www.justice.gov/usao-wdmi/press-release/file/1326161/download Details of the investigation] into the Gov. Whitmer kidnapping plot do not support the argument that it was a plot manufactured by informants
*Tucker has the [https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/08/us/gretchen-whitmer-michigan-militia.html number of people arrested in relation to the kidnapping plot] wrong, because his reporting is just based on a misunderstanding of [https://www.thegatewaypundit.com/2021/07/revealed-fbi-used-least-12-informants-whitmer-kidnapping-case/ a misleading headline from the Gateway Pundit]
*The FBI didn't "quietly" or "suspiciously" transfer Steven D'Antuono from the Detroit field office to the DC field office. They put out [https://www.fbi.gov/news/pressrel/press-releases/steven-m-dantuono-named-assistant-director-in-charge-of-the-washington-field-office a press release about it]

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan end the week with an actual Alex episode, checking in on the present day. In this installment, Alex gets into theories about Gavin Newsom, gets really disgraceful about a recent tragedy, and accidentally reveals that he knows he spreads Covid-19 misinformation.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/11/episode-616-november-9-2021 Episode #616: November 9, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex reports on [https://www.cnn.com/2021/11/09/health/immunocompromised-covid-19-booster-wellness-trnd/index.html a CNN headline] without even touching the content of the article, because it actually doesn't support his point
*Alex thinks the Pfizer pill is just ivermectin repackaged. [https://apnews.com/article/fact-checking-067310377629 It is not]
*Alex thinks that Gavin Newsom was paralyzed by a Covid shot. [https://www.kcra.com/article/no-reaction-gov-newsom-addresses-rumors-about-covid-19-booster-shot/38213983# He was not]
*Alex thinks that Bell's Palsy and Guillain-Barré are the same thing. They are not
*Steve Kirsch seems to have lost his mind [https://www.technologyreview.com/2021/10/05/1036408/silicon-valley-millionaire-steve-kirsch-covid-vaccine-misinformation/ over the course of the pandemic]
*Alex [https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-clots/fact-check-there-is-no-evidence-that-mrna-vaccines-are-linked-to-blood-clots-idUSL1N2PY1K2 lies about a doctor] claiming that he proved the vaccine gives people blood clots with a D-Dimer test
*Dr. Stella Immanuel has an affiliate marketing code for Alex's listeners to get a discount if they go to her to buy ivermectin or hydroxychloroquine. This may be illegal

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan dip back into the past. In this installment, Alex tries to pretend that Strom Thurmond wasn't racist, interviews an anti-Semite and an Islamophobe about how they don't like immigrants, and intrigues Dan with a tale about gold bars.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/14/episode-617-june-27-2003 Episode #617: June 27, 2003]</ref>:

*Strom Thurmond was very racist
*[https://d1lexza0zk46za.cloudfront.net/history/am-docs/southern-manifesto.pdf The Southern Manifesto]
*[https://www.theitem.com/stories/sen-strom-thurmond-switched-parties-in-64,314269 Strom Thurmond's party switch], and the [https://www.history.com/news/how-the-party-of-lincoln-won-over-the-once-democratic-south larger party swap]
*Alex and John Andrews are mad about Mexican [https://sgp.fas.org/crs/misc/RL32094.pdf matricula cards], which are IDs issued by the Mexican consulate
*John Andrews [https://leg.colorado.gov/sites/default/files/images/olls/2003a_sl_293.pdf passed legislation] in Colorado to limit the forms of ID which public entities could accept as proof of identity. This was supposedly about stopping undocumented immigrants from flouting the law, but it also [https://web.archive.org/web/20080918025427/http://www.brennancenter.org/page/-/d/download_file_39242.pdf really hurts citizens], particularly those living in poverty
*In 2019, [http://www.backboneamerica.net/america/2019/7/13/know-our-enemy-or-lose-our-liberty John Andrews gave a speech] about how the freedom of religion doesn't apply to Islam
*The trend of restricting what forms of ID could be accepted by public entities continued and resulted in [https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/PLAW-109publ13/pdf/PLAW-109publ13.pdf the Real ID Act]
*[https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/extremist-files/individual/glenn-spencer Glenn Spencer] was an old school self-appointed border guard, and doubtless the inspiration for the people doing it these days, including these [https://www.justice.gov/usao-nm/pr/larry-mitchell-hopkins-sentenced-21-months-federal-prison-illegal-firearm-possession-new two] [https://www.justice.gov/usao-nm/pr/man-sentenced-21-months-prison-impersonating-border-patrol-agent criminals]
*Glenn Spencer is also [https://web.archive.org/web/20081226015158/americanpatrol.com/SPENCER-GLENN/081223-JewInf-GS_081223.html an antisemite], who [https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/extremist-files/individual/kevin-macdonald cites Kevin MacDonald] in his writing
*The [https://www.stripes.com/news/gold-bars-pique-173rd-s-interest-at-checkpoint-1.5892 story about gold bars] [https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/ct-xpm-2003-06-05-0306050213-story.html being found in Iraq] ended up [https://www.nytimes.com/2003/08/02/world/all-bars-that-glitter-in-iraq-are-not-gold.html just being bars of mostly copper] from melted down shell casings
*Alex doesn't know the difference between JFK's [https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/A_Strategy_of_Peace 1963 commencement speech at American University] and his [https://www.jfklibrary.org/archives/other-resources/john-f-kennedy-speeches/american-newspaper-publishers-association-19610427 1961 speech] where he used the words "secret societies"
*JFK's [[-%20https://www.jfklibrary.org/archives/other-resources/john-f-kennedy-speeches/united-nations-19630920|speech in the UN General Assembly]] from September 1963
*The quote where JFK said he was going to destroy the CIA is definitely [https://gizmodo.com/the-story-behind-that-jfk-quote-about-destroying-the-ci-1793151211 not solidly sourced] and probably isn't real

title: 617: June 27, 2003

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in on Alex's response to the news that he lost the Connecticut case regarding Sandy Hook by another default judgement.  Plus, the gents check in with plaintiff's lawyer Mark Bankston about the developments.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/16/episode-618-november-15-2021 Episode #618: November 15, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex has lost the Connecticut Sandy Hook case by a default judgement
*Alex survived a time when a tornado picked up the car he was in
*Alex believes that Pfizer is adding a "heart attack drug" to their Covid-19 vaccine, which doesn't make sense considering his conspiracy is that the Globalists were trying to kill everyone off with the vaccines
*The drug, tromethamine, has been [https://www.prevention.com/health/a35002158/pfizer-vs-moderna-covid-19-vaccine-ingredients/ in the Moderna vaccine] all along
*Tromethamine is [https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-coronavirus-vaccine/fact-check-pfizer-is-not-including-tromethamine-in-its-covid-19-vaccine-to-counter-side-effects-idUSL1N2S31ML a very effective preservative], used in a wide variety of applications
*Tromethamine is not a heart attack drug, but treats Metabolic Acidosis, which is thought to possibly contribute to some heart attacks, but usually in folks who have [https://www.renalandurologynews.com/home/news/nephrology/chronic-kidney-disease-ckd/low-serum-bicarbonate-acidotic-ckd-may-up-risks-heart-failure-heart-attack-stroke/ late-stage kidney failure]
*Alex thinks Stephanie Ruhle makes millions of dollars a year, based on what he pulled up on a [https://www.legit.ng/1248262-stephanie-ruhle-bio-age-family-net-worth.html random celebrity information page]. [https://thefamousdata.com/stephanie-ruhle/ Other random celebrity information pages] have her salary as much lower, and [https://www.payscale.com/research/US/Employer=NBC/Salary PayScale's information] on NBC/MSNBC anchor's salaries reflects much lower incomes. Alex may be conflating salary with net worth
*Alex was conspicuous in his absence on the flier for the [https://www.thrivetimeshow.com/wp-content/uploads/Reopen-America-Tour-Episode-6-Version-11-ThrivetimeShow_converted-1.jpg San Antonio stop] of the Reawaken America Tour
*The event was seen as dicey, [https://religionnews.com/2021/11/15/why-a-crowd-was-chanted-lets-go-brandon-and-sang-to-jesus-at-john-hagees-megachurch/ even by Christian outlets], and also Mike Flynn suggested we needed to violate the first amendment and [https://baptistnews.com/article/michael-flynn-says-america-needs-one-religion-under-god/#.YZL1iWDMJPY have one religion] for the US
*Alex thinks a second grader got a school mask mandate overturned, but [https://www.palmbeachpost.com/story/news/education/2021/11/06/palm-beach-county-school-mask-mandate-ends-monday-thanks-court-ruling/6321596001/ they did not]
*Food-grade hydrogen peroxide [https://www.healthline.com/health/food-grade-hydrogen-peroxide is not food]
*Inhaling hydrogen peroxide [https://sciencebasedmedicine.org/the-brownstein-protocol-is-not-a-proven-treatment-for-covid-19/ has not been shown] to treat or prevent Covid-19
*You [https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/factcheck/2021/09/30/fact-check-experts-wary-xylitol-and-hydrogen-peroxide-nasal-rinses/5912060001/ should not] put hydrogen peroxide in your inhaler
*There is a new Covid variant [https://www.reuters.com/article/us-health-coronavirus-france-variant/france-investigates-new-coronavirus-variant-detected-in-brittany-idUSKBN2B80GQ being investigated in France], but the way Alex is talking about [https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-02275-2 changes to the spike protein] are misleading
*Alex gets the story about children in VA getting the wrong dose of the vaccine entirely wrong. He reported that they got too big a dose, but [https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/children-wrong-dose-vaccine-montgomery/2021/11/15/57de6340-4679-11ec-b8d9-232f4afe4d9b_story.html that is not true]
*Alex's ideas about public opinion during The Blitz [https://www.swwresearch.com/post/the-will-to-win-british-strategy-propaganda-and-public-opinion-1940-1942 don't seem to be very accurate]
*Klaus Schwab gave a speech at the [https://www.weforum.org/videos/the-great-narrative-narrating-the-future-english recent summit of the World Economic Forum]

title: 618: November 15, 2021

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan discuss how Alex is holding up after losing a bunch of court cases.  In this installment, Alex rambles about how he's murdered people, drifts into deeply misogynistic and homophobic territory, and has a dumb interview with Mike Flynn.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/21/episode-619-november-16-2021 Episode #619: November 16, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex is trying to raise $2 million from his audience for his court fees
*Alex airs a dumb interview with Michael Flynn
*Alex and Flynn are mad about [https://web.archive.org/web/20180312142848/https://www.nsba.org/about-us/frequently-asked-questions school board members], something they know nothing about
*Alex believes that women are genetically less able to stand up and fight
*Alex lashes out in a pretty homophobic way about Mayor Pete having a child
*Steve Kirsch still insists that Gavin Newsom got GBS from the vaccine. A [https://apnews.com/article/fact-checking-814848519404 doctored video] went around purporting to prove this, and Steve's blog includes [https://stevekirsch.substack.com/p/gavin-newsom-is-lying-about-his-vaccine a bunch of unconvincing arguments]

title: 619: November 16, 2021

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in to see how Alex is doing after getting subpoenaed about January 6. In a bizarre twist, instead of learning much about the subpoena, they find Alex launching a suspicious new project called Reset Wars.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/25/episode-620-november-23-2021 Episode #620: November 23, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex [https://january6th.house.gov/sites/democrats.january6th.house.gov/files/20211122%20Jones%20Letter.pdf got a subpoena] to appear to answer questions before the House committee that is investigating January 6
*[https://www.npr.org/2021/11/23/1058351733/new-subpoenas-trump-allies-january-6-capitol-select-committee A whole lot of folks] who are really sketchy have [https://www.npr.org/2021/11/06/1051652687/jan-6-panel-and-subpoenas-committee-targets-witnesses-linked-to-day-of-attack also gotten subpoenaed]
*Alex has started a new website called [https://www.resetwars.com Reset Wars], which is just an email address collection form at this point
*The [https://www.resetwars.com/termsofservice terms of service page for Reset Wars] says that it is presented by a company called Restore America Marketing Company, LLC, which was formed and incorporated on November 16, one day after Alex lost the CT Sandy Hook case in a default judgement

[[File:https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/58bc3c86b8a79bbdc67b182c/b4f028a1-77a9-4e22-8749-9892261d9f63/Capture.JPG|thumb|none]]

*This new company is incorporated in Delaware, unlike every other company Alex runs. People often incorporate in Delaware [https://www.incnow.com/blog/2017/03/24/why-do-companies-incorporate-delaware/ to protect their assets] from the consequences of sketchy behavior
*Alex recorded a video of himself in a creek to promote Reset Wars, which may be a six-hour course on how to defeat the Globalists, or may be a very transparent corporate reorganization and rebrand

[[File:https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/58bc3c86b8a79bbdc67b182c/39784c37-428c-4a34-a639-b6be4b5cec52/Reset.JPG|thumb|none]]

*Alex claims the entire EU is rolling out forced vaccinations, but it seems like he's actually just talking about [https://www.politico.eu/article/austria-mandatory-coronavirus-vaccination-february/ Austria]
*Alex claims the German government is threatening forced vaccinations, but they actually are [https://abcnews.go.com/Health/wireStory/health-minister-tells-germans-vaccinated-covid-81323958 saying the opposite]
*Alex reports on [https://www.breitbart.com/asia/2021/11/22/china-kyle-rittenhouse-proves-u-s-democracy-failed/ a Breitbart headline] that is actually just a misrepresentation of [https://www.globaltimes.cn/page/202111/1239555.shtml an article in The Global Times]
*Roger Stone tries to create a strawman version of [https://january6th.house.gov/sites/democrats.january6th.house.gov/files/20211122%20Stone%20Letter.pdf his own subpoena]

title: 620: November 23, 2021

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan examine a bit of a preview interview about the big new project, Reset Wars.  In this installment, the gents meet a promotion-obsessed hypnotist who thinks it's impossible to die and who helped Alex create Reset Wars.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/28/episode-621-reset-wars-episode-1 Episode #621: Reset Wars: Episode 1]</ref>:

*Alex is apparently working with [https://www.jakeducey.com a hypnotist] on his new project, Reset Wars
*Jake has [https://www.iheart.com/podcast/256-jake-duceys-2nd-mind-podca-30941079/ a podcast] and [https://www.youtube.com/user/jakeducey YouTube channel] that are mostly about how you can make tons of money easily. He also sells [https://www.transcendzen.com/2nd-mind-neuro-programmer-review/ a program] that claims to be able to "rewire your brain"
*Jake's use of a newer translation of Romans, one of very few that includes the word "pattern." It [https://biblehub.com/text/romans/12-2.htm doesn't appear in the Greek], and it's [https://www.biblegateway.com/verse/en/Romans%2012:2 in no translations published before 1976]
*Jake is very big on encouraging people to believe that their physical bodies are just "rental cars," and that you can't actually die
*The MK Ultra experiments were done because of fear that the Soviet Union had already mastered mind control techniques. This is reflected in [https://www.intelligence.senate.gov/sites/default/files/hearings/95mkultra.pdf Congressional hearings] about the program, and even some of the [https://documents2.theblackvault.com/documents/cia/mkultra/26-C00140401.pdf earliest documents] from the program
*All of Jake's information about Dr. Ewen Cameron comes from a [https://newsinteractives.cbc.ca/longform/brainwashed-mkultra CBC article] about a podcast about MK Ultra
*Jolyon West [https://www.theguardian.com/science/2004/feb/26/research.science killed an elephant] with LSD
*Ewen Cameron didn't run MK Ultra, [https://www.nytimes.com/1999/03/10/us/sidney-gottlieb-80-dies-took-lsd-to-cia.html that was Sidney Gottlieb]
*[https://press.armywarcollege.edu/parameters/vol28/iss1/12/ The Mind Has No Firewall article] from the US Army War College Quarterly issue from 1998
*Robert Spalding [https://www.axios.com/5g-memo-author-1517622680-3c5a0117-5024-4e79-b52a-b839f10ab77e.html left the National Security Council] because he wrote a memo about wanting to nationalize 5G networks
*1997 article from US News and World Report titled [https://web.archive.org/web/20071017110121/http://usnews.com/usnews/culture/articles/970707/archive_007360.htm Wonder Weapons]
*Alex doesn't seem to realize that [https://www.newsweek.com/project-mkultra-documents-cia-brainwashing-techniques-black-vault-1073061 more documents had been declassified] since 1977
*[https://www.newspapers.com/image/?clipping_id=32754833&fcfToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJmcmVlLXZpZXctaWQiOjE0NDE1MTczNywiaWF0IjoxNjM4MDYzMzY1LCJleHAiOjE2MzgxNDk3NjV9.Lz52Q7oE5upcwepzH-Bz3m0TfK_8p5Hg6x4xgJ98pGE 1988 Asbury Park Press article] that quotes Richard Cesaro, though the original interview was from two years prior
*Activist Post [https://www.activistpost.com/reading-list reading list]
*Documents describing [https://www.fbcoverup.com/docs/library/2013-01-2013-Whistleblower-Reveals-Military-Mind-Control-Project-at-Major-University-ASU-Secret-DARPA-Mind-Control-Project-Revealed-by-Anonymous-Bibliotecapleyades-net-Jan-29-2013.pdf the narrative study] from Arizona State University
*Project lead [https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/25690/cv Steven Corman's resume]
*FOIA requests only reflect [https://www.theblackvault.com/documentarchive/darpa-mind-control-project/ progress reports for phase 1] of this study. There does not appear to be evidence that the later phase involving Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation was ever even done
*The [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dzyh_nEuh3M GI Joe PSAs] were pretty fun
*[https://whois.domaintools.com/infowars.com Infowars], [https://whois.domaintools.com/banned.video Banned Dot Video], and [https://whois.domaintools.com/newswars.com News Wars] all are hosted by Epik. Strangely, this new website Reset Wars is [https://whois.domaintools.com/resetwars.com hosted by GoDaddy], which is far less secure and more susceptible to being taken offline
*Documents Alex and Jake didn't talk about at all that covered [https://documents2.theblackvault.com/documents/cia/behavioral/C00021825.pdf CIA experiments to remote control a dog]
*[https://apps.dtic.mil/sti/pdfs/ADA118457.pdf 1982 Air Force study] that Jake is misrepresenting
*Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists has [http://ftp.math.utah.edu/pub/tex/bib/toc/bullatsci.html an awesome archive] of tables of contents
*The quote that is claimed to be from Dr. Barbara Hatch Rosenburg's 1994 article [https://books.google.com/books?dq=Barbara%20Hatch%20Rosenberg%20%60%60Non-lethal%27%27%20weapons%20may%20violate%20treaties&hl=en&id=bAwAAAAAMBAJ&lpg=PA44&ots=8rLzZiO1Xa&pg=PA44&sa=X&sig=ACfU3U02WwvQ42tbag2Dv1HJ1irdGvz2SQ&source=bl&ved=2ahUKEwjXip7zzrr0AhXboXIEHS1QCUIQ6AF6BAgJEAM#v=onepage&q=Barbara%20Hatch%20Rosenberg%20%60%60Non-lethal''%20weapons%20may%20violate%20treaties&f=false does not appear in the text] of her article

title: 621: Reset Wars: Episode 1

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan dip into the past.  In this installment, the gents learn that they might have been a little off about Alex's history of Satanism claims.  Also, the show takes a turn for the homophobic, and Alex ends up getting some pushback from callers.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/11/30/episode-622-june-30-july-1-2003 Episode #622: June 30-July 1, 2003]</ref>:

*In homage to the shields of the Spartans, the letter lambda has become strongly associated with the military, including being present in many military [http://militaryfraternity.com/become-a-lambda-man/ fraternities] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lambda_Beta_Alpha sorority] names
*[https://www.worldhistory.org/Sacred_Band_of_Thebes/ The Sacred Band of Thebes]
*Alex's friend Mike Hansen is running for constable and funding the run by operating a firework stand
*Alex does not understand the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
*Stuart Gerstacker's is not a story of the CPS stealing children, it was an [https://web.archive.org/web/20160415180307/http://kidnappedson.blogspot.com/ ugly divorce], and he was clearly an unwell person, as evidenced by this [https://www2.traviscountytx.gov/commissioners_court/agendas/2007/07/text/vs070703_01.asp Commissioners Court transcript]
*The bill that would have made the Secretary of Homeland Security eighth in the line of succession [https://www.congress.gov/bill/108th-congress/senate-bill/148 passed the Senate] but [https://www.congress.gov/bill/108th-congress/house-bill/2319?r=65&s=1 did not pass in the House]
*Secretary of Homeland Security was made [https://www.law.cornell.edu/uscode/text/3/19 #18 in the line of succession] in 2006
*Alex misrepresents [https://www.c-span.org/video/?167674-1%2Fanti-terrorism-policy-review John Ashcroft's comment]s before the Senate Committee on the Judiciary
*This Thomas Paine quote is from a text called [https://www.bartleby.com/184/112.html Thoughts on Defensive War], and [https://books.google.com/books/about/New_Directions_in_Thomas_Paine_Studies.html?id=5BYtnQAACAAJ scholars are not in agreement] that it was actually Paine who wrote it
*An example of [https://itistreason.wordpress.com/category/obama/ the conspiracy theorist usage] of Catherine Bertini's words about using food as leverage
*Text of the report from the [https://authoring.prod.unwomen.org/sites/default/files/Headquarters/Attachments/Sections/CSW/PFA_E_Final_WEB.pdf 1995 World Conference on Women]
*[https://www.un.org/esa/gopher-data/conf/fwcw/conf/una/950906150325.txt Full context of Bertini's comments]

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan continue looking at the past, where they find the trends of homophobia continuing on the show.  Also, Alex reports erroneously on Swiss euthanasia, engages is deeply unethical sales practices, and warns of a 4th of July false flag terrorist attack that does not happen.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/2/episode-623-july-2-3-2003 Episode #623: July 2-3, 2003]</ref>:

*The Swiss population is [https://www.swissinfo.ch/eng/swiss-more-tolerant-of-euthanasia/3368434 more accepting of euthanasia]
*Alex reports that half of the deaths in Switzerland are due to suicide. This [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC1125125/ is definitely] [https://www.thelancet.com/pb-assets/Lancet/extras/03art3298web.pdf not true]
*A caller is mad about [https://www.nytimes.com/2003/07/02/us/wal-mart-sets-a-new-policy-that-protects-gay-workers.html Walmart adding sexual orientation] to its list of classes that are protected by discrimination rules
*A [https://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2003/jul/1/20030701-115636-9509r/ new survey] says that women are becoming more anti-abortion access. This does not seem to be in line with [https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2021/05/06/about-six-in-ten-americans-say-abortion-should-be-legal-in-all-or-most-cases/ some of the broader] [https://news.gallup.com/poll/245618/abortion-trends-gender.aspx opinion polling on the subject]
*Dr. Kevorkian did lose his license in [https://www.nytimes.com/1991/11/21/us/michigan-board-suspends-license-of-doctor-who-aided-in-suicides.html Michigan] and [https://www.nytimes.com/1993/04/28/us/doctor-who-aided-suicides-loses-license-in-california.html California], but I can find no evidence it was because he was inappropriate with corpses
*Alex seems to think that [https://www.nytimes.com/2015/11/04/world/middleeast/ahmad-chalabi-iraq-dead.html Ahmad Chalabi] and [https://www.nytimes.com/topic/person/hamid-karzai Hamid Karzai] are the same person, just different pronunciations of one name
*Churches could act exactly how Red Beckman wants them to, it just would violate their [https://www.irs.gov/charities-non-profits/charitable-organizations/the-restriction-of-political-campaign-intervention-by-section-501c3-tax-exempt-organizations%20 tax-exempt status]
*Alex is trying to lure his audience into buying silver from Midas Resources by offering them access to a secret DARPA document
*This DARPA document [https://web.archive.org/web/20030803074459/http://dtsn.darpa.mil/ixo/solicitations/cts/index.htm is just a posting] that was made to recruit research entities to bid for a contract for a program called Combat Zones That See. This is not a declassified document, and if this is a super secret thing, it's strange that the project lead has it [https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-strat-phd-a43461b on his resume]
*Alex confuses the [https://web.archive.org/web/20130817122719/http://www.newamericancentury.org/RebuildingAmericasDefenses.pdf PNAC document] with [http://www.takeoverworld.info/Grand_Chessboard.pdf The Grand Chessboard]

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check back in on the present day to see what Alex is up to. In this installment, Alex interviews a weirdo Australian MP, does an infomercial he swears isn't an infomercial, and says "baby" more times than you'd expect.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/7/episode-624-november-30-2021 Episode #624: November 30, 2021]</ref>:

*US [https://www.nytimes.com/2021/11/24/world/united-states-death-toll-covid.html deaths from Covid-19 are up in 2021] compared to 2020, but it's not for the reasons Alex thinks. The deaths that are happening are [https://ourworldindata.org/covid-deaths-by-vaccination predominantly among the unvaccinated]
*The latest life expectancy numbers [https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/pressroom/nchs_press_releases/2021/202107.htm are from 2020], and they do reflect a drop that was largely affected by Covid-19
*There is a history of cardiac problems among soccer players that predates Covid-19. See [https://www.theguardian.com/science/2018/aug/08/more-young-footballers-dying-of-heart-problems-than-thought-fa-study-finds here], [https://www.latimes.com/sports/la-xpm-2012-apr-21-la-sp-baxter-soccer-20120422-story.html here], and [https://nypost.com/2015/05/11/belgiums-young-soccer-players-dropping-dead-of-heart-attacks/ here] for examples
*Alex interviews Australian MP George Christensen, who seems to be developing a bit of a right-wing media grift, including a heavily promoted SubStack and trying to make money through [https://www.crikey.com.au/2021/05/06/george-christensen-promoting-books-amazon/ the Amazon affiliate program] using his SubStack
*Christensen has been called the "Member from Manila" due to his [https://www.9news.com.au/national/government-mp-george-christensens-extensive-travel-to-southeast-asia-under-fresh-scrutiny/e6824b5f-05c3-449f-9f2d-0c142d35d1c5 very frequent travel to the Philippines]
*Christensen laments how there aren't enough people in the government standing up for true freedom, but is also retiring from government next year, leaving the government with one less advocate for "true freedom"
*The claim that you can't get a "decent job" in Victoria unless you're vaccinated [https://www.shrm.org/resourcesandtools/hr-topics/global-hr/pages/coronavirus-australia-victoria-vaccination-directive.aspx doesn't seem true]
*The [https://www.theaustralian.com.au/breaking-news/qld-covid19-new-rules-for-states-vaccine-mandate/news-story/e4f296f492a7279ff62a03f8a4d9344e vaccine mandate in Queensland] has a lot of exemptions
*If there's a "vaccine apartheid" going on, it has to do with [https://www.nytimes.com/2021/10/27/world/united-nations-coronavirus.html lower-income countries not having access to vaccines], not George's grievances
*[https://www.nytimes.com/2021/08/16/world/australia/indigenous-australians-coronavirus.html NYT article] about the issues related to Covid-19 and the indigenous community
*The government in the Northern Territory and the Aboriginal Medical Services Alliance of Northern Territory [https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2021/nov/25/tinfoil-hat-wearing-tossers-nt-chief-minister-and-aboriginal-elders-hit-back-at-covid-false-information have said] that the stories about people being taken to quarantine camps are not true
*There are [https://www.finance.gov.au/government/property-and-construction/centres-national-resilience quarantine facilities] in Australia, but [https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/asia_pacific/australia-darwin-covid-quarantine/2021/05/21/f72bc0ac-ad1b-11eb-82c1-896aca955bb9_story.html they don't sound at all like how George describes them]
*Alex misrepresents [https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-forbes-headline-dna/fact-check-forbes-headline-that-was-updated-for-clarity-continues-to-be-taken-out-of-context-idUSL1N2SR1EK a story about a Forbes headline]
*Alex [https://healthfeedback.org/claimreview/natural-news-jump-to-conclusions-unsupported-by-study-cite-to-claim-covid-19-vaccines-destroy-immune-system-cause-cancer/ misrepresents] [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8538446/ one study] about Covid vaccines
*Alex misrepresents [https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28512351/ a second study] that isn't even about Covid vaccines, but he seems to be claiming it is, even though it was from August 2017
*Alex misrepresents an article titled [https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-02483-w The Tangled History of mRNA Vaccines]
*Alex pretends that fear-mongering about "cultural Marxism" isn't explicitly anti-Semitic
*Alex pretends he's not doing an infomercial for his satellite phone sponsor while doing an infomercial for his satellite phone sponsor

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in on how Alex's Sunday shows are going these days. In this installment, Alex misreports every headline he attempts to read, impotently tries to intimidate Trump and Rand Paul, and indicates that he thinks Luxembourg is part of Germany.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/9/episode-625-december-5-2021 Episode #625: December 5, 2021]</ref>:

*The [https://reuters.com/legal/government/wait-what-fda-wants-55-years-process-foia-request-over-vaccine-data-2021-11-18/ FDA wants 55 years] to release all their documents related to the Pfizer vaccine
*[https://phmpt.org/court-documents/ Court documents] from the Public Health and Medical Professionals for Transparency lawsuit
*[https://phmpt.org/pfizers-documents/ Pfizer documents] released so far, including [https://phmpt.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/5.3.6-postmarketing-experience.pdf the document discussed on the show]
*[https://www.politico.com/news/2020/12/16/trump-appointee-demanded-herd-immunity-strategy-446408 Politico articles] [https://www.politico.com/news/2020/09/11/exclusive-trump-officials-interfered-with-cdc-reports-on-covid-19-412809 about Paul Alexander], with links to released emails
*Alexander [https://www.theglobeandmail.com/world/us-politics/article-mcmaster-university-professor-embroiled-in-white-house-controversy-for/ was not chill] after he got fired
*The [https://newsbeezer.com/venezulaeng/covid-a-summit-in-rome-utters-a-rallying-cry-against-proponents-of-terror-science-and-health/ International Covid Summit in Rome] was full of real anti-vax weirdos, and Ira Bernstein [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r93YtNm0ieY was a speaker] there (his speech begins around the 2 hour mark of the video)
*Dr. Bissoon was big into [https://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-2099372/Is-testosterone-new-drug-choice-Wall-Street-How-traders-using-male-hormone-booster-shots-maintain-competitive-edge.html injecting Wall Street dudes with testosterone]
*Tucker Carlson's version of why Steve Bannon was indicted is very [https://january6th.house.gov/sites/democrats.january6th.house.gov/files/20210923%20Bannon%20Letter_0.pdf obviously] [https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/bannon-hell-capitol-attack/ wrong]. His comments about Roger Stone and Alex are equally absurd
*There are [https://www.luxtimes.lu/en/luxembourg/protests-intensify-against-luxembourg-covid-measures-61aba84bde135b92369f0a75 protests in Luxembourg]. Alex thinks Luxembourg is a city in Germany, which it is not
*Comments made by Archbishop Vigano [https://www.lifesitenews.com/opinion/vigano-considerations-on-the-great-reset-and-the-new-world-order/ are unhinged] and [https://thenewamerican.com/archbishop-vigano-calls-on-people-of-faith-to-unite-in-a-world-war-against-the-new-world-order/ sound a lot like Crusades stuff]
*The German paper Alex reports on [https://leadstories.com/hoax-alert/2021/12/fact-check-german-study-does-not-show-higher-vaccination-rate.html has been retracted and apologized for]
*The story about UK death rates is an instance of [https://www.politifact.com/factchecks/2021/nov/30/alex-berenson/alex-berenson-misrepresents-data-death-rates-vacci/ an anti-vax dude misrepresenting statistics]
*The story about Fauci killing children in HIV/AIDS drug testing is [https://apnews.com/article/fact-checking-410618634223 a distortion of history]
*Alex just makes things up about [https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2021/12/04/poll-majority-of-voters-concerned-about-potential-of-harmful-side-effects-of-vaccines/ an article] about voters having concerns about vaccine side effects
*Alex is reporting an erroneous version of [https://retractionwatch.com/2021/12/03/aha-regrets-any-confusion-and-is-reviewing-meeting-policies-after-outcry-over-covid-19-vaccine-abstract/ the story regarding an abstract] published on the American Heart Association's website

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in on Alex to see how he is doing.  In this installment, Alex brags about "waking up" people, decides that he is really into Glenn Beck now, and gets weird with his daughter over breakfast.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/12/episode-626-december-9-2021 Episode #626: December 9, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex asserts that Timothy Simpkins was released on bail because he is black. This is not a [https://nypost.com/2021/10/07/suspected-texas-high-school-shooter-released-from-jail/ fair assessment] of [https://nypost.com/2021/10/07/suspected-texas-school-shooter-timothy-george-simpkins-was-bullied-family/ the situation]. Also, there are examples of [https://www.courier-journal.com/story/news/local/2018/03/01/marshall-county-high-school-shooter-gabe-parker-courtroom-video/386764002/ white school shooters] [https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/breaking/ct-met-dixon-school-shooting-court-20180518-story.html who have been offered bail]
*Alex lies about the [https://phmpt.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/5.3.6-postmarketing-experience.pdf documents released by the FDA] regarding the Pfizer vaccine, specifically about the incidence of reports of spontaneous abortions ([https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/pregnancy-loss-miscarriage/symptoms-causes/syc-20354298 Mayo Clinic information on miscarriages])
*The Japanese Health Ministry does appear to have added [https://freewestmedia.com/2021/12/07/japanese-ministry-of-health-warns-of-serious-side-effects-from-vaccines/ a warning to some vaccines], but it [https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2021/10/14/national/science-health/japan-men-under-30-pfizer-moderna/ doesn't seem like there's any indication] that they are considering taking it off the market
*Alex misreports a [https://www.timesofisrael.com/fourth-covid-shot-for-all-israelis-a-possibility-health-minister-says/ story from the Times of Israel] about boosters
*Roger Wicker is the person who suggested a preemptive nuclear strike on Russia was [https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-10289031/Wicker-suggests-NUKE-Russia-Ukraine-invasion-claims-table.html on the table]. He also [https://mississippitoday.org/2020/11/25/wicker-searches-for-voter-fraud-as-mississippi-republicans-wont-acknowledge-trump-loss/ tried to help Trump find voter fraud] after the 2020 election
*Establishing cities based on a specific religion [https://law.justia.com/constitution/us/amendment-01/02-establishment-of-religion.html would violate the constitution]
*Transcript of Daniel Rodriguez's [https://storage.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.dcd.229256/gov.uscourts.dcd.229256.38.1.pdf interview with the FB]I
*Daniel Rodriguez's [https://www.justice.gov/usao-dc/press-release/file/1451986/download new indictment] for conspiracy
*You can find way cooler silver coins for cheaper [https://www.ebay.com/itm/165059047868?hash=item266e4931bc%3Ag%3ABDEAAOSwmuNhODOB on Ebay]
*[https://www.politifact.com/article/2021/dec/10/fact-checking-glenn-becks-claim-us-government-co-o/ Glenn Beck's claims] about the cooperation of Moderna and the NIAID [https://factcheck.afp.com/moderna-had-not-developed-covid-19-vaccine-2019 are fallacious]
*Lia Thomas set some records at the recent [https://pennathletics.com/news/2021/12/3/womens-swimming-and-diving-womens-swimming-diving-in-second-place-after-day-one-of-zippy-invitational.aspx Zippy Invitational], but she also came in fourth and fifth in other events
*Pre-transition, Lia was already [https://swimswam.com/will-thomas-sets-pool-record-penn-hosts-west-chester/ setting records] and being [https://pennathletics.com/sports/mens-swimming-and-diving/roster/will-thomas/14590 a very successful swimmer] at UPenn
*It appears that the first time that the name Klaus Schwab appeared in an Infowars article was in November 2020

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan dip back into the past to take in a rare treat.  In this installment, Alex invites Ann Coulter onto the show hoping to humiliate her with his debate skills and superior grasp on "the truth."  This does not go well.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/16/episode-628-july-10-2003 Episode #628: July 10, 2003]</ref>:

*Alex invites Ann Coulter onto the show in a misguided attempt to humiliate her for her neo-conservatism
*The Project for the New American Century wrote two letters in 1998 about Saddam Hussein, one to [https://web.archive.org/web/20040207055019/http://www.newamericancentury.org/iraqclintonletter.htm President Clinton] and one to the [https://web.archive.org/web/20040221062453/http://www.newamericancentury.org/iraqletter1998.htm GOP leadership]
*Alex weirdly never discusses the [https://www.nsa.gov/portals/75/documents/about/cryptologic-heritage/historical-figures-publications/publications/coldwar/venona_story.pdf Venona] [https://www.nsa.gov/Helpful-Links/NSA-FOIA/Declassification-Transparency-Initiatives/Historical-Releases/Venona/ Intercepts] when talking about the Soviet menace
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060301083602/https://www.senate.gov/artandhistory/history/common/generic/McCarthy_Transcripts.htm Joseph McCarthy sucked] and [https://web.archive.org/web/20060615173752/http://eisenhowermemorial.org/stories/Ike-Milton-McCarthy.htm got books burned]
*Alex is worried about the creation of a Pan American Union, even though some form of that exact thing has existed [https://www.oas.org/en/about/our_history.asp since 1889]
*The story of re-joining and leaving UNESCO is far more complicated than Alex reports it as. Also, in 2013 the US stopped paying dues [https://news.un.org/en/story/2011/10/393562-unesco-votes-admit-palestine-full-member because UNESCO let Palestine join], and then [https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/post-nation/wp/2017/10/12/u-s-withdraws-from-unesco-the-u-n-s-cultural-organization-citing-anti-israel-bias/ left in 2017], owing over $600 million
*S22 was [https://www.congress.gov/bill/108th-congress/senate-bill/22/text a dead bill] and doesn't include the things Alex claims
*[https://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/03pdf/03-6696.pdf Yusef Hamdi] was the American taken to Camp X-Ray
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20050608081331/http://www.prisonplanet.com/articles/july2004/220704gaypornstar.htm Prison Planet article] about porn star at Bohemian Grove. [http://www.voxfux.com/features/bush_child_sex_coverup/WashingtonTimes.htm Washington Times] article. [https://whorulesamerica.ucsc.edu/power/bohemian_grove_spy.html Spy Magazine] piece
*[https://www.cia.gov/library/abbottabad-compound/FC/FC8AEB056C2C32F10AFC327BA91F4A45_The_Bohemian_Grove_and_Other_Retreats.rtf.pdf G. William Domhoff book] that discusses "river jumping"
*Fritz Thyssen's [http://www.fpp.co.uk/docs/Irving/RadDi/2010/images/Thyssen_lo.pdf letters published in Life]
*Even the ADL [https://www.adl.org/news/article/prescott-bushs-alleged-nazi-ties does not approve] of calling Prescott Bush a nazi

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan reunite to examine a very tough day around Infowars. In this installment, Trump's comments about vaccines and boosters combine with financial woes and Alex not being able to see Spiderman to create a mood where maybe the world isn't worth saving.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/29/episode-631-december-20-2021 Episode #631: December 20, 2021]</ref>:

*Robbery statistics from the [https://jewelerssecurity.org/crime-statistics/ Jewelers Security Alliance]
*[https://www.politico.com/f/?id=0000017d-d93e-dac5-abff-f93f5bb80000 Alex's lawsuit] against the January 6 Committee
*[https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2021/12/17/eaton-taguba-anderson-generals-military/ Washington Post op-ed] written by retired generals
*George Strait [https://www.wfaa.com/article/entertainment/music/george-strait-psa-on-coronavirus/287-7ac38f0e-3894-44f7-b331-c972e1fac4b7 recorded a PSA] to encourage people to wear masks and to practice social distancing. He's also [https://www.dallasnews.com/business/retail/2017/09/07/jeff-bezos-roots-could-give-texas-an-edge-as-amazon-com-looks-for-new-hq-site/ Jeff Bezos's cousin]
*Biden did not announce new draconian measures aimed at the unvaccinated on Dec. 21 as Alex predicted. In fact, [https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/speeches-remarks/2021/12/21/remarks-by-president-biden-on-the-fight-against-covid-19/ his words] were fairly tepid
*The Supreme Court is [https://www.scotusblog.com/2021/12/justices-will-hear-arguments-on-jan-7-in-challenges-to-biden-vaccine-policies/ going to hear arguments] about the policy popularly called the vaccine mandate
*The [https://artscapewychwoodbarns.ca Artscape], where [https://www.thestop.org/farmers-market/ The Stop] farmer's market is located, is indoor and have options to cater to unvaccinated customers
*[https://thehill.com/homenews/coronavirus-report/587061-fauci-says-large-holiday-gatherings-not-safe-even-with-booster Fauci didn't say] you can't see your family unless everyone's vaccinated

details_html: Today, Dan and Jordan finish catching up by taking in Alex's very serious warning to Trump that he released on Christmas.  Then, they take in the December 29 episode to see how many stacks (aka "stackies") Alex can get through in one show.
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/12/30/episode-632-christmas-warning-and-more Episode #632: Christmas Warning And More]</ref>:

*Alex issued a dire warning to Trump in a Christmas message
*Alex found a study in a tweet from Ezra Levant. The [https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.12.20.21267966v2.full-text study itself] isn't something that supports the arguments they are making about it
*Denmark [https://www.nbcnews.com/science/science-news/denmark-lifts-covid-restrictions-crediting-high-vaccine-uptake-rcna1967 lifted Covid restrictions] in September, only to [https://www.politico.eu/article/denmark-tightens-up-as-omicron-spreads-extremely-fast/ reintroduce them] in November, in the middle of when the data for this study was being collected
*The [https://coronasmitte.dk/raad-og-regler/coronapas Danish Covidpas] is available for people who are unvaccinated but have tested positive in the past
*There are [https://phmpt.org/pfizers-documents/ new FDA documents] that have been released, but Alex doesn't know anything about them
*Alex lies about [https://www.fhi.no/en/studies/ungvoksen/increased-incidence-of-menstrual-changes-among-young-women/ a Norwegian study] about Covid vaccines and menstrual changes
*Alex is dishonest about [https://healthfeedback.org/claimreview/the-development-of-mrna-vaccines-was-a-collaborative-effort-robert-malone-contributed-to-their-development-but-he-is-not-their-inventor Robert Malone's credentials]
*Alex is also dishonest about Michael Yeadon's credentials
*Yeadon [https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20111007005082/en/Pulmatrix-Appoints-Respiratory-and-Allergy-Expert-Michael-Yeadon-PhD-to-Scientific-Advisory-Board did work at Pfizer until 2011], at which point [https://www.forbes.com/sites/johnlamattina/2017/03/15/turning-pfizer-discards-into-novartis-gold-the-story-of-ziarco/?sh=2ddd50d07572 he founded Ziarco], a pharma development company focusing on dermatology. It would go on to be [https://web.archive.org/web/20170506130429/https://www.novartis.com/news/media-releases/novartis-bolsters-innovative-dermatology-portfolio-through-acquisition-ziarco bought by Novartis], and the primary drug they were developing, ZPL-389, failed to progress past phase 2a trials and wound up [https://www.fiercebiotech.com/biotech/novartis-dumps-ziarco-eczema-drug-taking-485m-hit costing Novartis approximately $485 million]
*Alex covers a shitty non-study that he found from [https://stevekirsch.substack.com/p/bhakdiburkhardt-pathology-results a post on Steve Kirsch's blog]
*The [https://doctors4covidethics.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/end-covax.pdf study itself] is fully devoid of data, and is the product of an anti-vax outlet called [https://doctors4covidethics.org/doctors-for-covid-ethics-signatories/ Doctors for Covid Ethics]. [https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8482743/ Other studies] have looked at similar questions as this one and reached very different results
*Alex reports on an AFP story which was reposted on [https://www.ndtv.com/world-news/covid-tsunami-will-drive-health-systems-towards-collapse-who-2678540 an Indian news site], who created their own headline for the story, which is the only part of the article Alex even read
*Anderson Cooper did not suggest taking away social security from people who refuse to get vaccinated. It was [https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-anderson-cooper-social-securit/fact-check-anderson-cooper-did-not-say-the-unvaccinated-should-be-denied-social-security-benefits-in-clip-with-bill-gates-idUSL1N2TD1GY part of a question] that is being taken out of context
*Alex [https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-10343387/NASA-enlists-24-theologians-assess-world-react-discovery-alien-life.html misreports a story] about theologians discussing how various religions would respond to the finding of alien life, because he had [https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/heavens-above-nasa-hires-priest-to-prepare-for-an-alien-discovery-sdczvwgqm only read the headline]
*The story about [https://interestingengineering.com/chinese-scientists-created-an-ai-prosecutor-that-can-press-charges China's "AI prosecutor"] is not nearly as dystopian as it sounds on the surface
*The only dirt Alex can come up with about Trump has to do with the SEC investigating his social media company, which [https://www.theverge.com/2021/12/6/22820389/sec-trump-spac-deal-investigation-truth-social-media-platform-public was reported widely] about a month ago
*Alex [https://www.usnews.com/news/politics/articles/2021-11-23/us-to-require-vaccines-for-all-border-crossers-in-january misreports a story] about vaccine requirements at the border in such a way as to make it very anti-immigrant. He directly lies about details of the vaccine policy in the process
*Visa applicants [https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/News/visas-news/changes-to-vaccination-requirements-for-immigrant-visa-applicants.html are required to get the Covid vaccine], or else they are inadmissible to the country. Trying to impose vaccine requirements on theoretical people who sneak into the country would be a meaningless act, and completely unenforceable

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in on what may have been an all-time emotional low on The Alex Jones Show.  In this installment, Alex gets mad at Bette Midler, calls everything a paradox, and threatens to quit the show repeatedly.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/2/episode-633-december-30-2021 Episode #633: December 30, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex throws an extended tantrum and claims he's going to quit his show tomorrow
*The "paradox" of Tucker and Joe Rogan
*Alex misreports [https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-12-31/fact-focus-misinformation-persists-after-maxwell-trial-ends very basic details] of the Ghislane Maxwell verdict
*Alex misreports an [https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/crime/ghislaine-maxwell-jeffrey-epstein-little-black-book-b1975864.html Independent article] about Maxwell's black book. There also was a [https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/ghislaine-maxwell-black-book-fbi-b1984594.html follow up article] about how the FBI is investigating the black book
*Aaron Russo [https://bootlegbetty.com/2014/05/01/aaron-russo-the-man-bette-midler-just-couldnt-love/ wasn't married to Bette Midler]
*Alex gets very mad at Bette Midler because of something distasteful she tweeted, which [https://www.cnn.com/2021/12/22/entertainment/better-midler-west-virginia-apology/index.html she'd apologized for] approximately 9 days before this episode
*Alex is running a contest where if you crash a live TV news report and promote Infowars, he'll give you $5,000
*Alex gets mad about [https://www.menshealth.com/uk/health/a759648/in-5-years-you-could-buy-a-mens-breast-feeding-kit/ an old Men's Health article] about the possibility of men breast-feeding

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan dip back to the past to get a break from Alex's current day chaos. In this installment, Alex discusses his defiance-based politics, takes calls with PJW, and laments how his free speech is being infringed by local radio shows not letting him call in to argue.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/6/episode-634-july-11-2003 Episode #634: July 11, 2003]</ref>:

*In the present day, a man [https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2022/01/05/california-vaccination-clinic-attack-apollo/ attacked a vaccination clinic]
*Paul Joseph Watson is on to talk about [https://1library.net/document/zlgkrory-order-chaos-elite-terrorism-new-world-order-pdf.html his new book]
*Paul would later admit that [https://www.thedailybeast.com/alex-jones-protege-paul-joseph-watson-is-about-to-steal-his-crackpot-crown David Icke woke him up], not Alex
*Alex's own book was published by [https://web.archive.org/web/20210805222143/http://www.progressivepress.com/ Progressive Press], which also published the writing of [https://www.savethemales.ca/000612.html?_ga=2.177904877.99370410.1641412520-36664201.1641412520 noted anti-Semite Henry Makow]
*There were [https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/politics/2003/05/22/dropped-alzheimers-drug-reversed-disease-in-some/ae32bdc0-1809-4380-8c8b-28fc665563d8/ Alzheimer's] and [https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18352843/ nicotine vaccines] in development in 2003, but no one was suggesting that they be made mandatory
*Decisions about what vaccines are mandatory are [https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/parents/records/schools.html made on the state level]
*Antony Sutton's writing is [https://www.proquest.com/openview/692fb9148a320b350392a54dc2a68f87/1?cbl=1819744&pq-origsite=gscholar not well respected]

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in on a particularly bizarre stretch of time on the Alex Jones Show. In this installment, Ted Nugent corrects the record about Jan. 6, Alex gets mad about the HuffPost publishing some of his sales numbers, and the "Most Important Person In The World" is named.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/9/episode-635-january-6-7-2022 Episode #635: January 6-7, 2022]</ref>:

*Tucker Carlson forced Ted Cruz to apologize for calling the storming of the capitol "terrorism," even though [https://www.cnn.com/2022/01/07/politics/fact-check-ted-cruz-capitol-terrorist-attack/index.html he's done so consistently] for the last year
*Alex misreports comments about whether or not you can [https://www.skynews.com.au/australia-news/coronavirus/daniel-andrews-says-watching-the-sunset-is-not-in-the-spirit-of-melbournes-covid19-lockdown/news-story/abc7ebefbd9142d1261427d710ab9e56 look at sunsets] in Australia
*[https://www.coronavirus.vic.gov.au/victorian-coronavirus-covid-19-data Covid tracker for Victoria]
*The sign in the UK that said people couldn't look people in the eye as a Covid precaution [https://www.reuters.com/article/uk-factcheck-bar-satire-idUSKBN26K1UU was a joke] that Alex saw in a meme and just took seriously
*Covid lockdowns were being put in place in the Northern Territory in Australia because [https://7news.com.au/lifestyle/health-wellbeing/northern-territory-to-enter-lockout-from-1pm-as-covid-cases-double-c-5204865 cases exploded in a matter of days] and hospitals were strained. This was a lockdown that is [https://www.abc.net.au/news/2022-01-07/nt-covid-vaccine-pass-remote-health-reactions/100742188 self-policed]
*Ted Nugent still sucks, thinks January 6 was a false flag
*Alex reports on a story that 1 in 70 students at a private school had been diagnosed with myocarditis. This story is just based on [https://stevekirsch.substack.com/p/there-are-now-4-myocarditis-cases a blog post written by Steve Kirsch] that includes no evidence, and multiple instances of things Kirsch is absolutely just making up
*Alex corrects himself that Steve Kirsch isn't a pathologist, but that is [https://www.newswars.com/report-1-in-70-vaccinated-students-suffer-myocarditis-at-private-school-researcher-claims/ still in the Infowars article] written by Adan Salazar
*Alex spends an entire hour building up to saying that Tucker Carlson is the most important person in the world
*[https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/27/media/fox-news-pays-10m-tucker-carlson/index.html CNN reported] that Tucker made $10 million a year in 2020
*Alex interviews Jason Miller, the head of Gettr, which is a free speech social media platform that [https://news.yahoo.com/jason-miller-free-speech-gettr-171716637.html banned Nick Fuentes] for his speech
*The [https://stacks.stanford.edu/file/druid:xn269fv2966/20210812-gettr.pdf Stanford Internet Observatory Cyber Policy Center review] of Gettr is not promising
*Alex is mad about a [https://www.huffpost.com/entry/infowars-store-alex-jones_n_61d71d8fe4b0bcd2195c6562?v7 HuffPost article] about sales numbers for the Infowars Store, and he promises to fight back by plugging his products even more
*The start date on [https://www.scribd.com/document/551598070/Infowars-Store-Made-165-Million-Over-3-Years the sales figures] released by HuffPost is shockingly close to the date that Alex's former primary sponsor, Ted Anderson, [https://knowledgefight.com/people/2018/8/22/ted-anderson lost his license to sell precious metals]

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan dip into the past to look at the ways that Alex's response to the beginning of the 2009 H1N1 outbreak closely mirrored his response to the beginning of Covid. Also, Alex goes on Coast to Coast, and tries to call the White House.

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/13/episode-636-april-27-2009 Episode #636: April 27, 2009]</ref>:

*Alex's early reaction to the beginning of the 2009 H1N1 outbreak is reviewed and compared to many of the early reactions he had to the beginning of the Covid outbreak in early 2020
*[http://dehai.org/archives/dehai_archive/apr-jun09/0090.html PJW's 2009 article] suggesting that H1N1 may be a bioweapon
*Transcript of [http://edition.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/0904/26/cnr.03.html Gen. Honore on CNN]
*[https://www.cdc.gov/h1n1flu/information_h1n1_virus_qa.htm Explanation] of why it is not that weird that the virus had parts from three different lineages
*[https://www.uchicagomedicine.org/forefront/biological-sciences-articles/where-does-the-flu-come-from-every-year University of Chicago article] about where flus come from
*Baxter [https://www.webmd.com/cold-and-flu/news/20090720/swine-flu-vaccine-when did not] provide all the vaccines for the US, but [https://www.theguardian.com/world/2009/oct/11/swine-flu-vaccine-baxter did get in trouble for Medicare fraud]
*Tamiflu producer Gilead [https://finance.yahoo.com/chart/GILD was not having record profits] in 2009
*Kurt Nimmo's [https://web.archive.org/web/20090401015500/http://www.infowars.com/us-air-force-study-proposed-2009-influenza-pandemic-in-1996/ Infowars article] about Air Force 2025
*The actual [https://web.archive.org/web/20011030172851/http://www.au.af.mil/au/2025/index2.htm Air Force 2025 report]
*Transcript of [https://www.dhs.gov/news/2009/04/26/press-briefing-swine-influenza Napolitano's press conference] about H1N1
*Fox News' [https://www.foxnews.com/story/signs-point-to-milder-swine-flu-outbreak-than-once-feared non fear-mongering story] involves the same sources as stories from [https://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=103678167 NPR] and [https://www.cnn.com/2009/HEALTH/05/01/swine.flu.outbreak/index.html CNN], and many others
*[https://www.who.int/influenza/resources/documents/FluCheck6web.pdf WHO checklist] about influenza preparedness

title: 636: April 27, 2009

details_html:
Today, Dan and Jordan check in to see how Alex is doing with the news that his old buddy Stewart Rhodes got arrested for being part of a seditious conspiracy.  Also, Alex gets really weird about the concept of a "prison planet."

Citations
mediawiki_citations:
Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/1/16/episode-637-january-13-2022 Episode #637: January 13, 2022]</ref>:

*A man got [https://www.nytimes.com/2022/01/10/health/heart-transplant-pig-bennett.html a heart transplant from a pig]
*Alex misattributes a [https://barnardsvilleumc.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/ebook-lewis-c-s-the-great-divorce.pdf CS Lewis quote]
*Alex reveals that the Prison Planet is more literal than we previously thought, and that humans are in the prison planet because of crimes they committed prior to life (most likely)
*Alex lies about [https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/documenten/brieven/2021/12/18/bijlagen-3-bij-kamervragen-over-het-karakter-van-en-de-relaties-van-kabinetsleden-met-het-world-economic-forum-naar-aanleiding-van-antwoorden-eerder-hierover-van-het-kabinet some invitations] a few Dutch politicians received to attend the World Economic Forum. He combines this with an over-six month old video, pretending it's new
*A story about the Pretrial Services Agency in DC announcing that they are keeping records of employees who have religious exemptions to getting a vaccine is filtered through [https://www.dailysignal.com/2022/01/11/breaking-biden-administration-making-lists-of-religious-vaccine-objectors/ the Daily Signal], then through [https://citizenfreepress.com/breaking/biden-is-quietly-creating-a-database-of-the-unvaccinated/ Citizen Free Press], and then ultimately is reported by Alex as Joe Biden creating a database of unvaccinated people so he can force them to get a shot
*[https://news.yahoo.com/tucker-carlson-pushes-blatantly-false-163244556.html Tucker Carlson uses a video made by Harrison Smith] to report that white people can't get monoclonal antibodies
*Alex's buddy Stewart Rhodes got [https://www.justice.gov/opa/press-release/file/1462481/download?utm_medium=email&utm_source=govdelivery arrested on a number of charges], including seditious conspiracy
*Alex believes that Stewart's arrest is just [https://www.factcheck.org/2022/01/jan-6-conspiracy-theory-centers-on-baseless-claim-about-ray-epps/ to cover up Ray Epps]. It is not
*The videos of Ray Epps [https://twitter.com/MissN0b0dy1/status/1346660587636477954 do not show him committing a crime]
*Alex and Norm Pattis misrepresent and distort [https://www.justice.gov/opa/speech/attorney-general-merrick-b-garland-delivers-remarks-first-anniversary-attack-capitol the comments of AG Merrick Garland] in his speech about the anniversary of Jan. 6.
